jcr:content.jcr:title: List of biblical names starting with V

contentheadline.headline: List of biblical names starting with V

contentrichtext.text: {{Main|List of biblical names}}<br> [[List of biblical names starting with A|A]] - [[List of biblical names starting with B|B]] - [[List of biblical names starting with C|C]] - [[List of biblical names starting with D|D]] - [[List of biblical names starting with E|E]] - [[List of biblical names starting with F|F]] - [[List of biblical names starting with G|G]] - [[List of biblical names starting with H|H]] - [[List of biblical names starting with I|I]] - [[List of biblical names starting with J|J]] - [[List of biblical names starting with K|K]] - [[List of biblical names starting with L|L]] - [[List of biblical names starting with M|M]] - [[List of biblical names starting with N|N]] - [[List of biblical names starting with O|O]] - [[List of biblical names starting with P|P]] - [[List of biblical names starting with Q|Q]] - [[List of biblical names starting with R|R]] - [[List of biblical names starting with S|S]] - [[List of biblical names starting with T|T]] - [[List of biblical names starting with U|U]] - '''V''' - [[List of biblical names starting with Y|Y]] - [[List of biblical names starting with Z|Z]] ==V== See [http://www.biblestudytools.com/dictionaries/hitchcocks-bible-names/?letter=V Bible Study Tools Library letter V] or [http://www.ccel.org/ccel/hitchcock/bible_names.v.html Christian Classics Ethereal Library letter V] or [http://www.ccel.org/ccel/smith_w/bibledict.v.html Smith's Bible Dictionary letter V] or [http://www.ccel.org/ccel/easton/ebd2.v.html Easton's Bible Dictionary letter V] for additional definitions and Biblical sources. Most of the men's and women's biblical names can be found in Herbert Lockyer's books with a biblical source where in the bible they can be found.<ref name="Lockerbooks">Lockyer references</ref> Many also have a short study on the name.<ref name="Lockerbooks"/> Most of the Biblical name definitions for places, cities, countries, angels, gods, mountains and Hebrew names can be found in Nancy M. Tischler's two volume encyclopedia ''All things in the Bible, an encyclopedia of the biblical world'' with a short study on each of them.<ref>Tischler reference</ref> *[[Vajezatha]], sprinkling the chamber<ref name="ToolsCCEL">See [http://www.biblestudytools.com/dictionaries/hitchcocks-bible-names/?letter=V Bible Study Tools Library letter V] and [http://www.ccel.org/ccel/hitchcock/bible_names.v.html Christian Classics Ethereal Library letter V]</ref> *[[Vaniah]], nourishment, or weapons, of the Lord<ref name="ToolsCCEL"/> *Vashni, the second; changed; a tooth<ref name="ToolsCCEL"/> *[[Vashti]], that drinks; thread<ref name="ToolsCCEL"/> *[[Vophsi]], fragrant; diminution<ref name="ToolsCCEL"/> ==References== *Comay, Joan, ''Who's Who in the Old Testament'', Oxford University Press, 1971, ISBN 0-19-521029-8 *Lockyer, Herbert, ''All the men of the Bible'', Zondervan Publishing House (Grand Rapids, Michigan), 1958 *Lockyer, Herbert, ''All the women of the Bible'', Zondervan Publishing 1988, ISBN 0-310-28151-2 *Lockyer, Herbert, ''All the Divine Names and Titles in the Bible'', Zondervan Publishing 1988, ISBN 0-310-28041-9 *Tischler, Nancy M., ''All things in the Bible: an encyclopedia of the biblical world '', Greenwood Publishing, Westport, Conn. : 2006 ISBN 0-313-33082-4 == Inline references == {{Reflist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:List Of Biblical Names}} [[Category:Hebrew Bible people| List of names]] [[Category:Biblical people| List of names]] [[Category:Hebrew-language names| V]] [[Category:Jewish given names| V]] [[Category:Bible-related lists|Names]] [[Category:Lists of names|Biblical]] [[zh-min-nan:Sèng-keng choan-iú-bêng-sû lia̍t-toaⁿ]] [[bo:གསུང་རབ་ཀྱི་མིང་ཐོ།]] [[de:Liste biblischer Personen]] [[fr:Liste des personnages de la Bible]] [[ko:성서 등장인물 목록]] [[id:Daftar nama tokoh dalam Alkitab]] [[ia:Personages biblic]] [[nl:Lijst van Bijbelse personen]] [[ja:聖書の登場人物の一覧]] [[pl:Postacie biblijne]] [[pt:Personagens bíblicos]] [[fi:Luettelo Raamatun henkilöistä]] [[zh:聖經人物列表]]
